alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:41AM CST until January 12 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN EAST CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON PARISHES... WESTERN HOLMES...NORTHERN WARREN...SOUTHWESTERN LEFLORE...WESTERN YAZOO...SOUTHERN ISSAQUENA...HUMPHREYS AND SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 741 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morgan City to Midnight to near Onward, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Belzoni, Silver City, Morgan City, Louise, Midnight, Swiftown, and Holly Bluff around 745 AM CST. Cruger and Thornton around 750 AM CST. Yazoo City, Tchula, and Eden around 755 AM CST. Tolarville and Howard around 800 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central, north central, northwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
